Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE FUNCTION "PPM"."RPT_INV_HIERARCHY_INS_FCT" ( P_INV_HIER_ID IN NUMBER, P_PARENT_ID IN NUMBER, P_CHILD_ID IN NUMBER, P_IS_PARENT IN NUMBER, P_ALLOC_PCT IN NUMBER, P_LEVEL IN NUMBER, P_SEQUENCE IN VARCHAR2, P_CREATED IN DATE ) RETURN INTEGER IS BEGIN BEGIN INSERT INTO RPT_INV_HIERARCHY ( INV_HIERARCHIES_ID, PARENT_ID, CHILD_ID, IS_PARENT, ALLOC_PCT, THE_LEVEL, SEQUENCE_STR, CREATED_DATE ) VALUES ( P_INV_HIER_ID, P_PARENT_ID, P_CHILD_ID, P_IS_PARENT, P_ALLOC_PCT, P_LEVEL, P_SEQUENCE, P_CREATED ); EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN BEGIN ROLLBACK; GOTO OUTPUT; END; END; COMMIT; RETURN 0; <<OUTPUT>> RETURN -1; END;
